::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer/DeathStorm::

Zardus looks in the direction in which Wolfgang left. He chuckles.
The 
fool was too powerhungry to be alowed controll. Zardus raises his 
comm-link to his mouth.

"All alliance members," He says into it, sending the message to all 
the alliance members, "Wolfgang is a traitor. He is to be killed on 
sight. Anyone who rises to defend him is also a traitor."

That should take care of him, he thinks to himself. One more thing, 
though..

"Computer, unit Wolfgang is no longer friendly. Fire on sight. Block 
out commands from any panel but my wrist controlls."

He smiles as he hears the alliance base's comp's acnoledgement and 
flies off toward base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ and DevilDuer turn around, hearing the message. "Whatever you did, 
Wolfgang, it was a mistake." FZ says as the two open fire on Wolfgang.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A shadow passes over Zardus as he heads back to base. A raven lands
in 
front of him.

"Transform." The raven says and DeathStorm transforms into his robot 
mode.

Zardus blinks in surprise and pulls out his gun, leveling it at 
DeathStorm.

"Put down the gun. I wish to join you," DeathStorm says, "I am ... 
Proquest, a maximal traitor."

Zardus nods, noticing DeathStorm's pause before the name. "Very well. 
Follow me back to the base," He says and flies off, DeathStorm 
following
